description:
RealSimpleEDU.com brings you on-the-go learning and reference for MBA.

App offers quizzes and tutorials  to help you learn MBA.

App is continuously updated based on your feedback.Your 100% satisfaction is guaranteed.

App Tools include search .



Includes following tutorials:

Basic Principles Of Management,
Operations Introduction,
Leadership Introduction,
MIS Introduction,
Marketing Introduction,
Sales Introduction,
Business Strategy Analysis,
Economics Introduction,
Economics Math,
Accounting Introduction,
Accounting Vocabulary,

Accounting Sample,
Finance Introduction,
Financial Planning,
Corporate Finance,
Finance Time Value of Money,
Finance Net Present Value,
Financial Ratio,
Financial Math,
Project Communication,
Profit and Loss,
Math Numbers,
Math Ratio and Proportion,
Math Algebra,
Math Series and Sequences,
Math Simple Interest,
Math Probability,
Math Basic Statistics,
Math Advanced Statistics,



Includes following quizzes:

Quiz on Management Basics,
Quiz on Accounting Basic,
Quiz on Finance Basic,
Quiz on Project Management Basics,
Quiz on Fraction and Algebra,
Quiz on Statistics Basics,
Quiz on Miscellaneous Topics.

What is unique about RealSimpleEdu apps? 

1) A touch friendly, quick reference app, which is always in your pocket and always works (no data connection required)

2) A companion app for on-the-go, bite-sized learning 

3) Offers value for money (A lifetime of free updates) 

4) 225,000 paying customers from 153 Countries.


Our Vision: Provide on-the-go references that enable our customers to refer, learn and remember; easy to learn, more engaging and truly complete.

Our Mission: A RealSimpleEDU app in every pocket.

Please write to us. We would love to improve this app.
